text: 14 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO CONTENTS There was significant involvement from residents and individuals who live and/or work in the borough, producing a diverse sample of views and experiences of Tower Hamlets. 5.5 A summary of the Regulation 18 consultation for the new Local [Plan can be found at https://talk.towerhamlets.gov.uk/local-plan.](https://talk.towerhamlets.gov.uk/local-plan) 6. How to get involved 6.1 The Draft Local Plan has been published by Tower Hamlets Council Local Planning Authority (LPA) in order for responses to be made on it before it is submitted for examination by a Planning Inspector.
